    • TheHag

      public TheHag(String name, int health, int damage, int goldDrop)
      Constructor invoked from the supertype with no additional modifications.
      Parameters:
      name - String representing the name of the monster
      health - Integer value representing functional health of the monster
      damage - Integer value representing base damage dealt by the monster (before modifiers are applied)
      goldDrop - Integer value representing the bounty player will be given after defeating the monster.

  • Method Details

    • initialMessage

      public void initialMessage()
      Prints the message when encountering the enemy for the first time. Provides lore and flavor text to the player.
      Specified by:
      initialMessage in interface HostileActions
      See Also:
      • HostileActions

    • attackPattern

      public void attackPattern(int damageValue)
      Overridden interface method (hostileActions). Accepts precalculated randomized values as initial input. Then proceeds to add them to the expected monster base damage. And accounts for armor roll. In case of TheHag. Any resultant damage is applied twice. First to the Knight health pool, then to the knight mana pool. As such, Hag interferes with the ability of the player to cast spells during combat.
      Specified by:
      attackPattern in interface HostileActions
      Parameters:
      damageValue - Integer value representing calculated base damage modifiers passed by the combat Class
